root: ^Scrawled Handwriting: Those brightly coloured cuboid objects must represent keys to get past the coloured doorways. Perhaps they can be found on the rotating walls?.

^Scrawled Handwriting: I looked at one of the walls, and it seems as if 3 keys are required to obtain a bomb at the top. This bomb was then used to destroy the destructable block in the main hallway connecting these two platforms.
